name: Alex Johnson
title: Senior AI Engineer
about: Innovative AI engineer with 5+ years of experience in developing machine learning solutions and leading technical teams. Passionate about creating AI systems that solve real-world problems and drive business value.

experience.description: Lead development of AI-powered products and mentor junior engineers.
achievements: Reduced model inference time by 60% through optimization techniques
Led team that delivered 3 production ML models with 95%+ accuracy
Implemented MLOps pipeline reducing deployment time from 2 weeks to 2 days

experience.description: Developed and deployed machine learning models for various business applications.
achievements: Built recommendation system increasing user engagement by 25%
Created fraud detection model saving $2M annually
Automated data preprocessing reducing manual work by 80%

projects.name: AI-Powered Customer Support
